name: asthma
treatment_goals: To reduce airway inflammation and prevent asthma attacks.
self_care: Avoid triggers like dust, pollen, smoke
Use a peak flow meter to monitor breathing
long_term_management: Ongoing medication adjustment and lung function monitoring with regular doctor visits.

name: diabetes
treatment_goals: To maintain healthy blood sugar levels and prevent complications.
long_term_management: Regular A1C tests and screening for complications like retinopathy or neuropathy.

name: appendicitis
treatment_goals: To remove the inflamed appendix and prevent rupture or infection.
long_term_management: Typically not required after full recovery.

name: bronchitis
treatment_goals: To relieve symptoms and resolve infection or inflammation.
self_care: Rest and avoid smoke or irritants
long_term_management: Chronic cases (e.g., in COPD) require pulmonary rehab.

name: cancer
treatment_goals: To remove, shrink, or stop the growth of cancer cells.
long_term_management: Ongoing follow-up for recurrence and side-effect management.

name: chronic heart disease
treatment_goals: To improve heart function and prevent complications like heart failure.
long_term_management: Regular cardiology visits and medication adjustments.

name: cirrhosis of the liver
treatment_goals: To slow liver damage and manage complications.
long_term_management: Regular liver function tests and screening for liver cancer.

name: gallstones
treatment_goals: To relieve pain and prevent recurrence or complications.

name: hepatitis
treatment_goals: To reduce liver inflammation and prevent progression.
long_term_management: Regular liver monitoring and viral load testing.

name: hypertension
treatment_goals: To reduce and maintain safe blood pressure levels.

name: ischemic heart disease
treatment_goals: To restore blood flow and prevent heart attacks.
long_term_management: Cardiology care, stress tests, and medication adherence.

name: migraine
treatment_goals: To reduce frequency and severity of attacks.
treatment_options: Triptans or NSAIDs for acute relief
Botox or CGRP inhibitors for chronic cases
long_term_management: Regular neurologist consultation and symptom tracking.

name: pneumonia
treatment_goals: To eliminate the infection and restore normal lung function.
long_term_management: Vaccinations and respiratory checkups in high-risk individuals.

name: tuberculosis
treatment_goals: To cure infection and prevent transmission.
self_care: Avoid exposing others during active phase
long_term_management: Regular follow-up tests and public health monitoring.

name: ulcer
treatment_goals: To heal the ulcer and prevent recurrence.
long_term_management: Gastroenterologist check-ups and endoscopy if needed.
